00039 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00040 {
00041 
00042 /*! This class provides interfaces to store text parameter information. */
00043 class TextFileReader
00044 {
00045 public:
00046         /*! Constructor */
00047         TextFileReader();
00048 
00049         /*! Destructor */
00050         ~TextFileReader();
00051 
00052 protected:
00053         /*! Reads the body of the file.
00054          *
00055          * @param fileStream The file stream.
00056          * @param textData The parameter name/value pairs.
00057          */
00058         void ReadFileBody(std::ifstream &fileStream, std::map<std::string, std::string> &textData);
00059 
00060 public:
00061         /*! Reads the entire contents of the file.
00062          *
00063          * @param fileName The name of the text file to read.
00064          * @param textData The text file parameter name/value pairs.
00065          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CFileNotFoundException The file does not exist.
00066          */
00067         void ReadFile(const std::string &fileName, std::map<std::string, std::string> &textData);
00068 
00069         /*! Reads the entire contents of the file.
00070          *
00071          * @param fileStream The file stream of the open text file.
00072          * @param textData The text file parameter name/value pairs.
00073          */
00074         void ReadFile(std::ifstream &fileStream, std::map<std::string, std::string> &textData);
00075 };
00076 
00077 };
